title: Conservation of energy - block and spring on ramp

content.question: A spring of spring constant <math alttext="k" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>k</mi></math> is attached to the bottom of a ramp of negligible friction which makes an angle <math alttext="theta" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>θ</mi></math> with the floor. The block is then released. What is the distance <math alttext="d" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>d</mi></math> that the block slides up the ramp before momentarily coming to rest?
